message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice, how about a 55/45 split in my favor?  Seems fair given the inflation working against you.
I can still get a bit more, 57-43 is my new offer
Alice, let's be realistic. 52/48 is generous considering the time pressure and inflation eating away at your potential gains.
I'll take a bit less, 55-45, but that's as low as I'll go
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering 51/49 - take it before inflation eats away even more of your share!
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, 53-47, last chance
